### Read The Text
```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE, message=FALSE}
read_schedule <- read_csv("readings.csv",
                          show_col_types = FALSE) %>% 
                  as_tibble() %>%
                  mutate(Required = case_when(
                  Required == "checked" ~ as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))
              )) %>%
                  mutate(across(everything(), as.character)) %>%
                    filter(Week == 10) %>% #CHANGE HERE
                    select(-Week) %>%
                  filter_all(any_vars(!is.na(.))) %>% 
                  mutate(
                    across(everything(), ~replace_na(.x, ""))
                  ) %>%
                select_if(~!all(is.na(.))) 
  
```

```{r message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
kable(read_schedule, 
      "html", 
      escape = FALSE,
      align = 'lllccccccccc') %>%
  kable_paper(full_width = F) %>%
  column_spec(1, width = "15em") %>%
  column_spec(2, width = "20em") %>%
  column_spec(3, width = "7em") %>%
  column_spec(4, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(5, width = "10em") %>%
  column_spec(6, width = "5em") %>%
  column_spec(1:6, color = "#ffffff") %>%
  row_spec(0:1, extra_css = 'vertical-align: middle !important;', color = "#ffffff", background = "transparent")
```

### Read Papers

```{r echo=FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("square", fill = "#63d6c6"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-square", fill = "#63d6c6"))

pdf_link1 <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/handouts/Bryman%20(2006).pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

pdf_link2 <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/handouts/Greene,%20Caracelli%20&%20Graham%20(1989).pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

pdf_link3 <- function() {
 paste0("<a href='/handouts/McKim%20(2017).pdf' target='_blank'>", "<img src='/logos/pdf-ico.png' alt='Slack icon' width='40'>", "</a>")
}

readings <- tibble(
  
  paper <- c(
           "Bryman, A. (2006). Integrating quantitative and qualitative research: how is it done? <i>Qualitative Research, 6</i>(1), 97–113.<a href='https://doi.org/10.1177/1468794106058877' target='_blank'>https://doi.org/10.1177/1468794106058877</a>",
           "Greene, J. C., Caracelli, V. J., & Graham, W. F. (1989). Toward a Conceptual Framework for Mixed-Method Evaluation Designs. <i>Educational Evaluation and Policy Analysis 11</i>(3), 255-274. <a href='https://doi.org/10.3102/01623737011003255' target='_blank'>https://doi.org/10.3102/01623737011003255</a>",
            "McKim, C. A. (2017). The Value of Mixed Methods Research: A Mixed Methods Study. <i>Journal of Mixed Methods Research, 11</i>(2), 202–222. <a href='https://doi.org/10.1177/1558689815607096' target='_blank'>https://doi.org/10.1177/1558689815607096</a>"
  ),
  
  download <- c(
    pdf_link1(),
    pdf_link2(),
    pdf_link3()
  ),
  
  .name_repair = "minimal"
  
)

```
